title: Designs for Citibank/Citicorp Logos and Logotype
medium: Graphite and black ink on white tracing paper
description: Vertical list of four possible Citibank/Citicorp logotype designs. Top design uses bold italic sans-serif font. Second design uses thin sans-serif font. Third design features the word "Citicorp" in a bold sans-serif font. In fourth design, Citicorp is rendered in bold serif stencil font. Alongside each logotype design is a logo depicting a four-pointed nautical star within horizontal oval with longitude and latitude lines.
name: Drawing
